submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        h_p = 1
        v_p = 1
        t_c = 0
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        h_i = 0
        v_i = 0
        while h_i < len(horizontalCut) and v_i < len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[h_i] >= verticalCut[v_i]:
                t_c += horizontalCut[h_i] * v_p
                h_p += 1
                h_i += 1
            else:
                t_c += verticalCut[v_i] * h_p
                v_p += 1
                v_i += 1
        while h_i < len(horizontalCut):
            t_c += horizontalCut[h_i] * v_p
            h_i += 1
        while v_i < len(verticalCut):
            t_c += verticalCut[v_i] * h_p
            v_i += 1
        return t_c
